short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome Extension to help motivate people in recovery

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Days are shorter than we think. Our countdown timer will hopefully let you see that the day is almost over and provide you with strength and inspiration to get through it. We've included some inspirational quotes as well. You got this!
